description: An API operation for adding one or more tags (key-value pairs) to a resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

parameters.name: resourceTags
parameters.description: A list of tag key value pairs that are associated with the resource. (dict) --- The tag structure that contains a tag key and value. The key that's associated with the tag. value (string) --- The value that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key that's associated with the tag.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value that's associated with the tag.
